mapper.select: select RS.reservation_id AS reservation_id, M.name AS user_name, RT.name AS room_type, RT.base_occupancy AS base_occupancy, RT.max_occupancy AS max_occupancy, R.room_number AS room_number, RS.check_in AS check_in, RS.check_out AS check_out, RS.status AS status, RS.total_amount AS total_amount FROM reservation as RS JOIN member AS M ON RS.member_id=M.member_id JOIN room AS R ON RS.room_id=R.room_id JOIN room_type AS RT ON R.room_type_id = RT.room_type_id;

select RS.reservation_id AS reservation_id, M.name AS user_name, RT.name AS room_type, RT.base_occupancy AS base_occupancy, RT.max_occupancy AS max_occupancy, R.room_number AS room_number, RS.check_in AS check_in, RS.check_out AS check_out, RS.status AS status, RS.total_amount AS total_amount FROM (SELECT * from reservation where reservation_id=#{reservaionId}) as RS JOIN member AS M ON RS.member_id=M.member_id JOIN room AS R ON RS.room_id=R.room_id JOIN room_type AS RT ON R.room_type_id = RT.room_type_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (user_id, room_id, checkin, checkout, total_amount) SELECT #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{totalAmount}) FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE id = #{userId}) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rooms WHERE id = #{roomId}) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM reservations WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND NOT (#{checkout} <= checkin OR #{checkin} >= checkout) );
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET check_in = #{checkIn}, check_out = #{checkOut} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND member_id = #{memberId};
UPDATE reservation SET check_in = #{checkIn}, check_out = #{checkOut} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId};
UPDATE reservation SET room_id = #{roomId} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId};
UPDATE reservation SET status = #{status} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND status != 'COMPLETED';
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND status = 'PENDING'
